communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: CISA / ANALYGENCE 2024 Contract
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

The contract between CISA and ANALYGENCE, awarding them a contract for helping with the CISA "Vulnrichment" program, and/or any support related to CVE ID analysis. Specifically, the amount of money dedicated to that specific task, the terms and conditions of said work, expected requirements, and any deadlines. A copy of the full contract with line-item expenditures is sufficient to fill this request.

Reference: 
https://www.securityweek.com/cisa-announces-cve-enrichment-project-vulnrichment/
https://app.g2xchange.com/fedciv/posts/dhs-awards-227m-contract-for-coordinated-vulnerability-disclosure-support

I am an amateur journalist and will use these documents in part of my published work. I understand that there may be fees associated with this document retrieval and hereby agree to pay up to $100 for the retrieval and duplication of the requested documents. If the fee is in excess of $100, please contact me before beginning any work.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Brian Martin

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: NIST / ANALYGENCE 2024 Contract
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

The contract between NIST and ANALYGENCE, awarding them a contract for helping with the National Vulnerability Database (NVD) backlog of enriching CVE IDs, and/or any support related to CVE ID analysis. Specifically, the amount of money dedicated to that specific task, the terms and conditions of said work, expected requirements, and any deadlines. A copy of the full contract with line-item expenditures is sufficient to fill this request.

Reference:
https://therecord.media/nist-nvd-backlog-contractor-analygence

I am an amateur journalist and will use these documents in part of my published work. I understand that there may be fees associated with this document retrieval and hereby agree to pay up to $100 for the retrieval and duplication of the requested documents. If the fee is in excess of $100, please contact me before beginning any work.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Brian Martin
